A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Luke suffers from Major Depressive Disorder and the whole movie is about his psycho therapy rather than anything else then he ends up committing a weird act of suicide. This the weirdest twist to a generational saga. Whoever came up with this should be dragged out of his office and crucified. He messed up a whole generation whom Luke symbolized something far greater than Star Wars.

It is Luke Skywalker god damn it. 

You need to watch it to understand how one person can mess up a generation.
